body:
Chapter 4300 - Chapter 4300: 4299, Success

Chapter 4300: 4299, success

Translator: 549690339

“Failure!”

“Failure!”

“Failure!”

Wang Xian looked at the results in the lamp of divination. His eyes sparkled.

He had been quietly waiting and checking.

As long as he had an idea in his mind, there would be an ending. He did not have to try it step by step.

The energy in the lamp of divination was exhausted. Wang Xian used another year to replenish it!

Time passed quickly once again.

However, this time, in just five years, a successful result appeared under the lamp of divination.

When Wang Xian saw this scene, an excited expression appeared on his face.

He didn’t dare to hesitate. With a wave of his arm, he threw the bait out.

Following that, in Wang Xian’s vision, a dark tide surged towards the bait, surging towards the position of the Sword of light.

With this force, the bait surged to the back of the Sword of light!

At this moment, Wang Xian focused his attention and directed the bait towards the sword of light!

Buzz

In the next instant, the bait carried the fishing line and circled the Sword of light twice!

“I’ve succeeded!”

Wang Xian was pleasantly surprised.

The result was exactly the same as the result in the lamp of divination.

However, although he had succeeded now, he still needed to pull the sword of light over.

The Sword of light contained a terrifying power. If Wang Xian pulled the fishing line directly, the sword of light might be able to cut the fishing line.

Therefore, to be on the safe side, it was best for Wang Xian to transfer the energy to the fishing line so that the sturdiness of the fishing line would be enhanced.

If it was not enough, the balance might be broken the moment he made his move.

The energy in Wang Xian’s body would also overflow and he would be attacked by the surrounding energy!

“Although these two elemental gods are very terrifying, my strength is not weak either. Even if I were to be attacked by two elemental gods at the same time, I would be able to withstand them for some time!”

Wang Xian mumbled to himself. For the sake of safety, he was prepared to make a move and use force!

Buzz

A surge of energy surged along the fishing line at a rapid speed. The entire fishing line emitted a ray of Luster!

In the next moment, he pulled forcefully with his arm.

The fishing line wrapped around the sword of light and flew towards him at a rapid speed!

When Wang Xian saw that the sharp sword did not put up too much of a resistance, his eyes were filled with joy!

“Boom! Boom!”

“Boom! Boom!”

However, at this moment, Wang Xian’s actions had affected the impact of the surrounding energy.

The source of the energy was Wang Xian. The surrounding forces of darkness and light were also surging towards him.

After all, Wang Xian was a living being. Under such circumstances, he had to resist!

Once he resisted with all his might, the balance in his body would be broken!

Boom

However, at this moment, Wang Xian’s body trembled. He quickly flew to the side of the Sword of light and kept it away!

Boom! Boom! Boom

The moment Wang Xian moved, the surrounding light and dark energy seemed to have completely boiled up and attacked Wang Xian directly!

The terrifying tides were filled with the penetration of light and the Corrosion of darkness.

The terrifying characteristics of the two elemental energies were completely unleashed.

The slightly calm battlefield was like a huge tsunami as it charged towards Wang Xian!

Boom

At this moment, Wang Xian could no longer maintain the balance between light and darkness!

This was because the energy had already charged towards him. He could only defend himself and escape quickly!

His body trembled and he flew out like a sharp sword!

The surrounding energy was pressing towards him.

The energy in Wang Xian’s entire body was boiling as it broke through all the energy!

Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom

At this moment, the god of light and the God of darkness seemed to have locked onto Wang Xian. Streams of vast energy were chasing after him!

Boom! Boom

Wang Xian did not turn back and continued to attack.

Originally, he would need two days to fly out of this area.

However, at this moment, he only needed one to two minutes to unleash his full strength.

However, he had to withstand the full-strength attack of these two elemental gods for one to two minutes!

The five elements millstone appeared around him and wrapped him up.

The Tai Chi Dragon Disc continued to wrap him up!

The powers of the Void Dragon Body and the Void Dragon Pool surged into Wang Xian’s body and tore apart the obstacles in front of him!

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

The roars of the two elemental gods seemed to be coming from the back.

The sudden appearance of such a powerful existence at Wang Xian’s level in their territory made the two elemental gods extremely violent.

The two elemental gods even began to move their bodies and get closer to Wang Xian.

However, they did not give chase with all their might unconsciously!

However, at this moment, due to Wang Xian’s attack, the balance of the entire area was broken.

The power of light and darkness in the entire area was boiling.

It was as though a calm lake was stirring up huge waves!

“What’s going on?”

At another location, Song Ta and Old Man Sword were fishing with their eyes closed!

The sudden violent energy caused their expressions to change slightly.

They hurriedly pulled out the fishing line to prevent the violent energy from cutting off the fishing line and losing the bait!

“The two elemental gods have experienced violent fluctuations. An extremely powerful existence has entered and destroyed the balance within. This area is about to be changed!”

Old Man sword frowned as he watched the scene in front of him!

“The riot area has been in a state of balance for a very long time. Now that the balance has been broken, it will affect the entire body. I reckon that the entire riot area will undergo some changes.”

“This may be a good thing, or it may be a very bad thing. I have to make preparations. Before the other balance is reached, it won’t be safe for the time being.”

Song Ta’s eyes flickered as he said, “I don’t know if it’s a good thing or a bad thing.”

“It’s time for us to move. Every time the equilibrium is broken, there will be opportunities.”

The sword old man swept his gaze around and said!

Song Ta also nodded.

Under normal circumstances, very few people would break the equilibrium of the riot zone.

Especially when the riot zone had not been completely explored.

Or when he knew that there was a treasure somewhere that he had yet to obtain.

Once the balance was broken, everything might be broken.

However, this was something that Wang Xian, who had just arrived here, did not know about!

At this moment, Wang Xian had already rushed out of the area of the two elemental gods and flew to the quicksand region.

At this moment, Wang Xian also noticed the movement behind him. It seemed to be much bigger than he had imagined.

The balance between the two elemental gods was broken, and the range of their battlefield had also changed.

They were even moving as they fought, looking for the next balance.

The two elemental gods had changed, and the quicksand around them had also changed drastically.
